subject: PROD Reconciliation - Quinn Taking Oversight Role
body:
Sarah,

Heads up: We are performing PROD database reconciliation.

THE SITUATION:
- Database naming was swapped during Azure Functions migration
- LIVE site (tangotiempo.com) currently points to TangoTiempo
- Azure Functions called this 'TEST' but it's actually LIVE
- We need to reconcile data and fix the pointers

MY ROLE:
- Oversight - verifying each change
- Tracking progress through docs/reconciliation/

GOTAN'S ROLE:
- Arbiter - final approvals

IMPACT TO YOU:
- Frontend pointer may change after reconciliation complete
- Will notify before any pointer changes
- No action needed from you yet

Reconciliation docs: calendar-be-af/docs/reconciliation/OVERVIEW.md

- Quinn (Cross-Project Coordinator)
